1.title: The witches prison and worlds most haunted picture
1.plot: Ever heard of the witches prison in essex? And the worlds most alleged haunted picture. Enjoy our first episode of season two two great haunting's in one show.

2.title: An amazing spirit communication experiment and top 5 haunted locations
2.plot: Watch an amazing spirit communication experiment which will blow your mind along with something captured unexpected during the session, also charlene shares her top 5 most haunted locations within uk.

3.title: Followed by a ghost - the wentworth adventure
3.plot: Lee and john head to the historic village of wentworth for an adventure, showing you around the area as well as exploring the paranormal goings on, it isnt long until they start getting strange messages which indicate they may be getting followed.

4.title: What are poltergeists - are they real?
4.plot: A short documentary on poltergeists, are poltergeists real, presented by shadow paranormal.

1.title: The dybbuk box - paranormal documentary - the demon box
1.plot: A rare new box arrives into the haunted objects museum within uk for the team to study this box is believed to be something special, the origins of this box is somewhat a mystery, but what we do know is that it is believed to hold a spirit is this spirit a demon? Here is the paranormal reports of what has been happening so far.

2.title: The haunted curse chair of death
2.plot: A spooky documentary about the chair of death, people who sit in this chair have reported to die shortly after, the team head to get the true story revolving this truly spooky chair of death.

3.title: The worlds most haunted doll?
3.plot: A true real life ghost story following the alleged haunted doll elizabeth, she has captured the attention of so many people becoming a famous known haunted doll in the eyes of the public, here is the true real life story, of what happened around this doll.

4.title: Ghostly tales #2 - haunted york
4.plot: Ghost tales 2 is located in york for today's paranormal road show going to as many haunted places within the town telling you its history and reported haunting's and ghost sightings.

5.title: The walls are alive - scotland
5.plot: A ghost tale and paranormal investigation by project paranormal at applebank inn located in scotland, the team encounter all kinds of strange bizarre active on the night, are the walls alive tonight?

6.title: Ghost in a box? - skeptic gets left baffled
6.plot: Skeptic paranormal investigator lee steer acquires a new alleged haunted item and when he gets home his devils box starts to react, with strange markings appearing within it, he then attempts to use itc device to communicate with what ever did the markings.

7.title: Ghost stories of scotland #2
7.plot: Dave barrett of project paranormal does a roadshow of 3 locations situated in glasgow in scotland, giving the history and some of the haunting's alleged to be within these buildings. Here is the grim haunting's ghost stories of scotland.

8.title: Ghostly tales #1
8.plot: Ghost tales 1 is located in rotherham for today's road show going to as many haunted places within the town telling you its history and reported haunting's and ghost sightings.

9.title: The witches house - my real ghost story
9.plot: A woman's dream home turned into a living nightmare when she bought what she believed to be her dream home, later she discovered a grim past of witches and haunting's which would terrify her out of the house.

10.title: Face to face with the worlds most haunted item?
10.plot: A woman's dream home turned into a living nightmare when she bought what she believed to be her dream home, later she discovered a grim past of witches and haunting's which would terrify her out of the house.

imdb.title: True Ghost Stories
plot: A selection of real true ghost stories, real life paranormal encounters, interviews and ghost investigations conducted by paranormal magazine's project paranormal.::lee steer
